Name: Green Dragon
Ingredients: 15 ml Giffard Peppermint Pastille crème de menthe
10 ml Chilled water omit if using wet ice
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Review: Mint, juniper, caraway and fennel make for an unusual cocktail that's conducive to fresh breath.
History: Adapted from Harry Craddock's 1930 The Savoy Cocktail Book .
Nutrition: One serving of Green Dragon contains 193 calories
